title: Gemcraft 2 Chasing Shadows v1.0.13 Cracked
description:
Gemcraft: Chapter 2: Chasing Shadows, version 1.0.13


This cracked version differs from the official version in the following ways:

- Can play it locally from your hard-drive..
- Premium mode is enabled, so you have access to all skills, and also endurance mode..
- The flash version check has been disabled..

Starting with this version (1.0.13) the flash version requirements went from 11.7 to 11.2 so that it can be played on linux, however, just in case, in this cracked version the check for flash version has been disabled, meaning you can use any flash version, even pre-11.2..


The official change-log from version 1.0.13 is as follows:

> Fixed an exploit involving upgrading gems (thanks Kapucin0!)
> Flash player requirement rolled back to 11.2 (sorry Linux players for not revising the code earlier to make this happen! There might be bugs (some probably related to the old Linux Flash player and thus unfixable on Linux))
> Shadow cores spent but not used on fragment rarity boost can be taken back with right click or ctrl-click
> Gems fire at corrupted mana shards and sleeping hives only in 'Structure' priority
> Some typos fixed


Any way, have fun with this cracked gemcraft.. It will be years before the next gemcraft is released..

Love and light,
signed your most bestest friend that you never had because you were too scared to talk to me when we passed by each other in real life that one day,
okonomiyaki
